Plot: A man goes out to buy some milk. In the process he stumbles on a number of film genres. Western, Science Fiction, Romantic Comedy, Film Noir and Action, almost every type of film is part of...
Title: The Good, the Bad and the Milky Way
Writer: Hans Dieter Edler, Hans Dieter Edler
Actors: Marc Stumpf, Cherise Silvestri, Franz Nono Schreiner, Patrick Gruber
